before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"afso8","text":"Make sure you work in a DNA-free environment. Preferably in a PCR preparation hood. This is to avoid contamination of your stock and working primer solutions.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":158}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"enk57","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqb69","text":"Use PCR-grade water (DNase- and RNase-free) to reconstitute and dilute your primers.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":84}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f0aqp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4us7b","text":"Use filter pipette tips to prevent contamination via pipetting.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"align-justify","offset":0,"length":63}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5t1u8","text":"Stock primers should not be directly used in a PCR because they are concentrated. Working from one tube is a bad idea, and thus it only takes a small amount of contamination to render your primers ineffective. For this reason, it is best practice to create working solutions that are of lower concentrations. The concentration of choice for a working primer solution is user-dependent. However, 100uM is used for this protocol.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"69vs5","text":"Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cm80v","text":"1 x PCR grade H2O","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0hjq","text":"1 x solidified forward primer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"diaap","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"20ead","text":"Equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4c4ll","text":"1000uL pipette, tip box, \u0026 tips","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"266pa","text":"Vortex and spin down primer tube: this breaks up the solidified primer at the bottom of the tube and brings the primer debris up from the bottom of the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4cn4f","text":"Look for nM (nanoMoles) on the printed primer label and circle. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f30ph","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"917r4","text":"Ex:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"due32","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"779","error":false,"guid":"AFB64CF0E35811ECB44741833EAE4334","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cqrt9","text":"Multiple nM by 10, then add that much PCR grade water to the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dsgo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0rmc","text":"Ex:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8sgoi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"779","error":false,"guid":"B194D0F0E35811ECB44741833EAE4334","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a1g35","text":"Once the sitting period has elapsed, place new   stock in a   freezer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":47,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3tkbe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"BE8D79A0E35911ECB44741833EAE4334","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"E1F28F80E35811ECB44741833EAE4334","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1oibg","text":"For Working Concentration of Forward Primer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":44}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ds6vn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8f38l","text":"  of FP stock +   molecular grade H2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":16,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1aohg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"F5842C70E35811ECB44741833EAE4334","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"900","error":false,"guid":"F3E41100E35811ECB44741833EAE4334","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

title: Forward Primer Reconstitution
